item.title: By: Mena
item.dc:creator: Mena
item.description: My server is one that's being offered free transfers off of. Concerned about the message on the login screen that says if enough people don't transfer off the over-populated servers, they will be forced to split realms. My guild isn't transferring and I haven't seen a major transferrence going on. Looks like we'll likely get split :(
